Package com.futurice.cascade.reactive.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AltArrayAdapter<T>
    Manipulate an ArrayAdapter safely from any thread
    MirrorArrayAdapter<V>
    Created by Paul Houghton on 20-Oct-14.
    ReactiveEditText
    Created by Paul Houghton on 12-03-2015.
    ReactiveImageView
    An ImageView which can be directly bound to change the screen when an up-chain value changes
    ReactiveTextView
    Change the displayed value from any thread by calling view.bindable.set(String value)
